keys.string: As I walk into the room, I see Danny sitting behind his computer. He has dark circles under his eyes, his eyes shift to me as soon as I walk in.
Oh... Hey [NAME],... I was doing some rank grinding in League of Heroes, but I ended up staying up all night. Thankfully I have some gourmet coffee to wake me up!
Danny, reshifts his gaze to the monitor. A victory screen is on it, and he stands sluggishly, arms raised, indicating that he won!
Yes... Promotion series! Alright... Gotta get ready for class, but first, some coffee!

Danny walks over to the coffee maker in the corner of his room, and pours himself a nice mug of coffee. He drinks the entirety of the mug. His eyes shoot open, and he showed loads of vigor and jittering.
You kidding?! I feel amazing! This coffee is my secret weapon for making it through my classes! Bow before the might of the coffee bean!
Danny makes a dramatic pose pointing to the sky, somewhat frozen in place. I proceed to quietly shuffle out of his room at the odd display.

[Danny][Dialog]Oh... Hey [NAME],... I was doing some rank grinding in League of Heroes, but I ended up staying up all night. Thankfully I have some gourmet coffee to wake me up!
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny, reshifts his gaze to the monitor. A victory screen is on it, and he stands sluggishly, arms raised, indicating that he won!
[Danny][Dialog]Yes... Promotion series! Alright... Gotta get ready for class, but first, some coffee!

[Narrator][Dialog]Danny walks over to the coffee maker in the corner of his room, and pours himself a nice mug of coffee. He drinks the entirety of the mug. His eyes shoot open, and he showed loads of vigor and jittering.
[Danny][Dialog]You kidding?! I feel amazing! This coffee is my secret weapon for making it through my classes! Bow before the might of the coffee bean!
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny makes a dramatic pose pointing to the sky, somewhat frozen in place. I proceed to quietly shuffle out of his room at the odd display.
